desc: Welcome to BelairNY.com - an online smoke shop where you can find premium tobacco smoking pipes for sale. Patent pending technology. Made in Germany.

layout.text: Absolutely heavy-duty and ergonomically designed smoking device weighting 1/4 pound (approximately 114 grams).
Professionally crafted in Germany using a durable, wear and rust-resistant, medical-grade, easily cleanable, insulation-effective, non-toxic, and leak-proof material.
Luxury editions in 18k gold and platinum with diamonds are available.
Each pipe is transformable into a variety of different pipes
All pipes fully assembled with an air pump, a face mask, branded bag and other accessories.
A limited warranty is included with each of our products.
